title: Generative AI Chatbot
description: AI-powered photo app to ease posting for enthusiastic social media users, exploring prompt engineering and model fine-tuning.
longDescription: Building an AI-powered photo application designed to simplify social media content creation. The project focuses on exploring prompt engineering techniques and model fine-tuning to improve AI-generated insights and response accuracy. Actively working on enhancing the AI's ability to generate contextually relevant and engaging content for social media posts.

title: Automated Trading Bot
description: Self-help trading bot for personal use that receives commands via Telegram and executes automated entry and exit trades on configured schedules.
longDescription: Developed a personal trading automation system that integrates with Telegram for command-based control. The bot executes automated trading strategies with scheduled entry and exit points, allowing for hands-free trading operations. Built with Python, featuring robust error handling, logging, and configuration management for reliable 24/7 operation.
